summary: Exception in FoldConstants while inspect if statements.

comments.content:
Here is the test case:

function foo() {
      if(sections.length != 1)children[i] = 0;
      else var selectedid = children[i]
} 

Here is the stack trace:

23: java.lang.RuntimeException: INTERNAL COMPILER ERROR.
Please report this problem.
GETELEM 2 is not a string node

      if(sections.length != 1)children[i] = 0;
  Parent: Input_0:1:15
